output_list.reason: In the transfer function, there is a possibility of integer overflow. If the balance of the sender is less than the value to be transferred, the subtraction operation will underflow and the balanceOf[_to] will overflow.

In the transferFrom function, there is a possibility of integer overflow. If the balance of the sender is less than the value to be transferred, the subtraction operation will underflow and the balanceOf[_to] will overflow.
In the mintToken function, there is a possibility of integer overflow. If the totalSupply is less than the mintedAmount, the addition operation will overflow.
In the transfer function, there is a possibility of unauthorized access. The function does not check if the sender has the necessary allowance to transfer the specified amount.
In the transferFrom function, there is a possibility of unauthorized access. The function does not check if the sender has the necessary allowance to transfer the specified amount.
